entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 21 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
